title: iOS build suddenly fails: `error: exportArchive: exportOptionsPlist error for key "method": expected one of {app-store, ad-hoc, enterprise, development, validation}, but found app-store-connect`

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
I've been building for iOS for AppStore with the same command when all of a sudden it fails with:

```
2025-07-13 17:52:23.380 xcodebuild[88931:522416] [MT] IDEDistribution: -[IDEDistributionLogging _createLoggingBundleAtPath:]: Created bundle at path "/var/folders/n5/00f4x0cx17xbyv5d77btvnwr0000gn/T/app_iOS_2025-07-13_17-52-23.379.xcdistributionlogs".
error: exportArchive: exportOptionsPlist error for key "method": expected one of {app-store, ad-hoc, enterprise, development, validation}, but found app-store-connect

Error Domain=IDEFoundationErrorDomain Code=1 "exportOptionsPlist error for key "method": expected one of {app-store, ad-hoc, enterprise, development, validation}, but found app-store-connect" UserInfo={NSLocalizedDescription=exportOptionsPlist error for key "method": expected one of {app-store, ad-hoc, enterprise, development, validation}, but found app-store-connect}

** EXPORT FAILED **
```

Command used:
```
cargo tauri ios build --export-method app-store-connect
# Same result with pnpm
```

Any clue?
